battleship.components

Class ComponentFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleship.components.ComponentFactory

  • public class ComponentFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a factory object that creates basic components of the application.
    Version:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private ComponentFactory()
      Method that hides the constructor since the factory does not need initialization.

      Creates a label with given style.
      static javax.swing.JPanel wrapInEquallyDividedPanel(java.awt.Component... comps)
      This function wraps multiple components into one JPanel and let them equally divided into areas.
      static javax.swing.JPanel wrapInEquallyDividedPanel(int hgap, java.awt.Component... comps)
      This function wraps multiple components into one JPanel and let them equally divided into areas.
      static javax.swing.JComponent wrapInLeftAlign(javax.swing.JComponent... comps)
      This function wraps multiple components into one JPanel and does not change the size or alignment.
